metadata.title: CVE-2015-1192 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Absolute path traversal vulnerability in kgb 1.0b4 allows remote attackersto write to arbitrary files via a full pathname in a crafted archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1192` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

kgb - 1.0b4+ds-14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: kgb package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0b4+ds-14').
